Fixed Point

Source: R/dynamical-systems-notes-fixed-point.R
FixedPoint.Rd

Fixed Point

Usage

FixedPoint(y0, func, tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps), max_iter = 1000L)

Arguments

y0

Numeric. Initial condition.

func

Function. The input is \(y_{i \left( t - 1\right)}\) and the output is \(y_{i t}\).

tol

Small numeric value. Convergence criteria.

max_iter

Large positive integer. Maximum number of iterations.

Author

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

Examples

# linear
func <- LinearConstructor(alpha = 8.0, beta = 0.8)
FixedPoint(y0 = 0.01, func = func)
#>  [1]  0.01000 14.40640 19.52512 23.62010 26.89608 29.51686 31.61349 33.29079
#>  [9] 34.63263 35.70611 36.56489 37.25191 37.80153 38.24122 38.59298 38.87438

# logistic
func <- LogisticConstructor(r = 1.5, K = 10)
FixedPoint(y0 = 0.01, func = func)
#>  [1] 0.01000000 0.02244382 0.03359017 0.05021601 0.07494576 0.11157611
#>  [7] 0.16549679 0.24413680 0.35726478 0.51675146 0.73507238 1.02155885
